TopicTitle: CTD after Asteroid Capture around Kerbin

Articles.Content:
KSP Version: Windows Steam 1.0.2.842 32bit

Nature of the Issue: Completed mission to orbit Class A Asteroid around Kerbin. Clicked "Space Center" button to return to space center, game crashed.

Reproduction: No save available to revert to prior to crash.

Version of Operating System: Windows 8.1 x64

[Crash Log File](https://www.dropbox.com/s/5a7qofnmp6asmzt/output_log.txt?dl=0)
